label: 加地子
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: “added rent.” Lesser cultivators sublet parcels from local holders and myōshu, paying them rents in addition to the rents owed proprietors.
